name: CoinerBot–Acryptocurrencypricefinder
0:
”Alexa, ask coiner bot what is the price of Bitcoin.”
”Alexa, ask coiner bot to set my default currency Euro.”
”Alexa, ask coiner bot to get me the price of eth.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: coiner bot
des:
Coiner bot is an Alexa skill which can give you the price of various cryptocurrencies in fiat currency of your choice.
Coiner bot supports more than 100 cryptocurrencies And it supports 9 fiat currencies.
Getting price is as simple as saying a single phrase. It also uses your Alexa locale to give you the price in your native fiat currency.

You can use this skills by saying.
Alexa, ask coiner bot what is the price of {Cryptocurrency name or symbol}
Alexa, ask coiner bot to set my default currency {Fiat currency name or symbol}

Cryptocurrencies supported -
Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin, Cardano, NEO, Stellar, EOS, IOTA and 90 more.
And you can get price of these cryptocurrencies in (fiat currencies)
US dollars, Indian rupees, Euros, Pounds, Australian Dollars, Canadian Dollars, Swiss francs, Yens, New Zealand dollars.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
